summary: When a female rock band use an infamous old piece of sheet music to record their new album in an old mansion, they accidentally open a portal to hell.
cast: Daria Nicolodi|Jasmine Maimone|Pascal Persiano|Maria Cristina Mastrangeli|Michel Klippstein|Pietro Genuardi|Luana Ravegnini|Roberto Giannini|Giada Cozzi|Elena Pompei|Perla Costantini|Donald Pleasence
keywords: supernatural power|psychotronic film|crashing into an invisible barrier|inspired by real person|paganini
title: Paganini Horror
